ing: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen whole-kernel corn, thawed
des: "Cold salad is made with corn and peppers. You will be proud to take with you for any holiday occasion!"
ins: In a large bowl, mix together the corn, yellow pepper, red pepper, green pepper, red onion, cucumber, tomato and mayonnaise. Adjust the amount of mayonnaise to your liking. Chill until serving.
